features-split-body-text.defaultMessage: ‌‍​‍​‍‍‍‍​‍​﻿‍‌﻿​﻿​‍﻿​﻿﻿‍﻿​﻿​​﻿‍‍​​‌‍‌﻿​‌﻿​​‍‌‌‍Applanga's innovative, browser-based editor shows you the context where your translations will appear—for better context and easier reviewing.

features-tiles-body-text.defaultMessage: ‌‍​‍​‍‍‍‍​‍​﻿‍‌﻿​﻿​‍﻿​﻿﻿‍﻿​﻿​​﻿‍‍​​‌‍‌﻿​‌﻿​​‍‌‍‌However big or small your translation needs: With Applanga you can create anything from quick to multi-step translation workflows as well as matching review processes. Create your own workflow status, your very own filters, and leverage user groups to ensure all the right people can access the relevant content or get notified about changes.

hero-body-text.defaultMessage: ‌‍​‍​‍‍‍‍​‍​﻿‍‌﻿​﻿​‍﻿​﻿﻿‍﻿​﻿​​﻿‍‍​​‌‍‌﻿​‌﻿​​‍‌‍﻿Our landing page template works on all devices, so you only have to set it up once, and get beautiful results forever.

testimonial-1-body-text.defaultMessage: ‌‍​‍​‍‍‍‍​‍​﻿‍‌﻿​﻿​‍﻿​﻿﻿‍﻿​﻿​​﻿‍‍​​‌‍‌﻿​‌﻿​​‍‍‌​Applanga has successfully been able to meet all of our translations needs across both our Android and iOS apps. The tool works great and their team is always there for us to provide support for our global applications.

testimonial-2-body-text.defaultMessage: ‌‍​‍​‍‍‍‍​‍​﻿‍‌﻿​﻿​‍﻿​﻿﻿‍﻿​﻿​​﻿‍‍​​‌‍‌﻿​‌﻿​​‍‍‌﻿Our entire localization process over 20 languages with more than 400 members on our multilingual team is handled via Applanga. It works great for us.

testimonial-3-body-text.defaultMessage: ‌‍​‍​‍‍‍‍​‍​﻿‍‌﻿​﻿​‍﻿​﻿﻿‍﻿​﻿​​﻿‍‍​​‌‍‌﻿​‌﻿​​‍‍‍‍With Applanga you can set up and manage workflows in whatever way works best for your organization.

features-split-header-title-body.defaultMessage: ‌‍​‍​‍‍‍‍​‍​﻿‍‌﻿​﻿​‍﻿​﻿﻿‍﻿​﻿​​﻿‍‍​​‌‍‌﻿​‌﻿​​‍‍‍﻿No matter how many users your app has or how many languages you support—Applanga is designed to handle them with ease. It even supports hundreds of translators working on your app at the same time.

features-split-header-body-text.defaultMessage: ‌‍​‍​‍‍‍‍​‍​﻿‍‌﻿​﻿​‍﻿​﻿﻿‍﻿​﻿​​﻿‍‍​​‌‍‌﻿​‌﻿​​‍‍﻿‌Applanga integrates easily and without requiring you to adapt your app. Ease the demands on your development team and automatically keep everything in sync.

features-tiles-header-body-text.defaultMessage: ‌‍​‍​‍‍‍‍​‍​﻿‍‌﻿​﻿​‍﻿​﻿﻿‍﻿​﻿​​﻿‍‍​​‌‍‌﻿​‌﻿​​‍‍﻿‍Applanga is a suite of tools to set up and manage localization workflows for any software in any language.

testimonials-header-body-text.defaultMessage: ‌‍​‍​‍‍‍‍​‍​﻿‍‌﻿​﻿​‍﻿​﻿﻿‍﻿​﻿​​﻿‍‍​​‌‍‌﻿​‌﻿​​‍﻿​​Read what our clients say about Applanga.
